"Supplying Malmoth Meat":
"My customers are all saying the meat
from the Tundra is magnificent! I've
heard rumors of an incredible beast
called Malmoth. Tee-hee, you know me
too well〜. Yes, I want to add Malmoth
to the menu and continue what is sure to
be my legacy of dishes devised from the
primeval Tundra! Thaaank yoooou〜!

※Drops from Lv.31+ Malmoths."
